name: Abstract VR
description:
This is a Virtual Reality experience for the 3DJAM.

It requier an Occulus Rift and a Leap Motion headmounted.

Sound input make the speaker react like a real speaker.

In the alpha version, an abstract photosphere viewer can be show.

The photosphere is shoot by Michel Montagné at Nîmes in the 'Expo de ouf 3' , a Street Art temporaly exposition.

The final version should embed an interactive track from macroabstract (https://soundcloud.com/macroabstract)
